1370: Anselmi was born in St. Joris straet in 1370.
Got married to Sipper at age 24 in 1370.
Had a son with Sipper, Anselmi, at age 24.
1371: Had a son with Sipper, Breghtgherus, at age 25.
1374: Had a daughter with Sipper, Scilla, at age 28.
1375: Had a daughter with Sipper, Lenildis, at age 29.
1376: Had a son with Sipper, Anselmi, at age 30.
1377: Had a daughter with Sipper, Linnea, at age 31.
1378: Had a son with Sipper, Florens, at age 32.
1388: Lost son Anselmi when Anselmi was 13 years old.
